tool_description: Splits a blob of text into semantically contained fragments.
name: Text Segmentation
title: Text Segmentation

api_list.name: text-segmentation
api_list.description: Given a blob of text, splits it into semantically contained segments.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-segmentation.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-segmentation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-segmentation.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-segmentation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
